docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: With luck, the latest New York Times/CBS News poll that found that access to affordable health care is at the top of the public's domestic agenda will motivate political leaders to address the dysfunctional health care system (front page, March 2).
docs.abstract: Prof Thomas M Cassidy letter says Americans should be given choice of keeping health insurance they already have or opting for expanded Medicare program (March 2 article)
docs.snippet: To the Editor:     With luck, the latest New York Times/CBS News poll that found that access to affordable health care is at the top of the public's domestic agenda will motivate political leaders to address the dysfunctional health care system...

docs.lead_paragraph: China will create a new agency to invest the country's immense reserves of foreign currency, now totaling more than $1 trillion, the country's finance minister announced today. The minister, Jin Renqing, offered no specifics about how much of China's currency reserves would be under the new agency's control. But whatever the precise figure, analysts say that the agency is certain to begin life as one of the world's biggest investment funds.

headline.main: China to Open Fund to Invest Currency Reserves
